Oct. 23: Learn how probation and parole affects our community members.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Join us this Wednesday, October 23 for a panel discussion focused on the urgent need to reform probation and parole in Pennsylvania. Speakers will include ACLU-PA Campaigns Director Danitra Sherman; member of the Barristers' Association A. Nicole Phillips; and FAMM's Director of State Policy in Pennsylvania Celeste Trusty.

Reforming Probation and Parole

A town hall presented by ACLU of Pennsylvania and the Barristers' Association of Philadelphia.

Wednesday, October 23, 6:15 – 8:30 p.m.
Uncle Bobbie's Coffee & Books
5445 Germantown Ave.
Philadelphia, PA 19144


This event is free and open to the public. Limited seats available.

Questions? Contact Rebecca Cusumano-Seidel at rcusumano-seidel@aclupa.org or call 215-592-1513 x135.

Send a message to your state senator: Take action to reform probation in PA by voicing your support for SB 14.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Pennsylvania
